text: "Yellow Submarine" is a 1966 song by the Beatles. It is from their seventh studio album Revolver. It was issued as a double A-side single to "Eleanor Rigby". It was also used in the 1968 movie of the same name. It topped the single charts in Australia, Austria, Belgium, New Zealand, Canada, Ireland, the Netherlands, Norway, Germany and the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1966 songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:Ringo Starr songs Category:Pop songs
title: Yellow Submarine (song)
